description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: Chinese communist revolutionary, political theorist, and founding father of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义理论家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Chinese Marxist theorist, politician, who served as the Chairman of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese statesman and revolutionary, who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义革命家，中国人民解放军的创始人和领导者之一，中华人民共和国元帅。
description.en: Chinese general, warlord, revolutionary, and one of the founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家，中华人民共和国和中国共产党的主要领导人之一。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary leader who was one of the most senior political leaders of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代政治家、军事家，中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中国共产党中央委员会副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician and marshal of the People's Republic of China who was pivotal in the Communist victory in the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: Chinese revolutionary leader, paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from December 1978 to November 1989.

zh-cn: 中国共产党第一代领导集体

description.zh-cn: 对中国共产党第八届中央委员会七名政治局常委毛泽东、刘少奇、周恩来、朱德、陈云、林彪和邓小平的合称，被视为中国共产党第一代领导集体。
description.en: A collective term for the seven members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China: Mao Zedong, Liu Shaoqi, Zhou Enlai, Zhu De, Chen Yun, Lin Biao, and Deng Xiaoping, regarded as the first generation of collective leadership of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会
en: 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第八次全国代表大会选出的中央委员会。
description.en: The Central Committee elected by the 8th National Congress of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在长征途中举行的一次中央政治局扩大会议，确立了毛泽东在党内的领导地位。
description.en: An enlarged meeting of the Politburo of the Communist Party of China held during the Long March, which established Mao Zedong's leadership position within the Party.

en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The working body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期重要领导人之一。
description.en: An early important leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

en: 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第七次全国代表大会，确立毛泽东思想为党的指导思想。
description.en: The 7th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which established Mao Zedong Thought as the party's guiding ideology.

description.zh-cn: 中共七届一中全会选出的五位中央书记处书记，是中国共产党第一代领导集体的核心。
description.en: The five secretaries of the Central Secretariat elected at the first plenary session of the 7th Central Committee of the CPC, who were the core of the first generation of collective leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期重要领导人之一，“五大书记”之一。
description.en: An early important leader of the Communist Party of China, one of the 'Five Great Secretaries'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: First Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 选举产生了新的中央领导机构。
description.en: Elected a new central leadership body.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 1954年至1975年间中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The supreme military leading body of the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1975.

en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the CPC

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会第五次全体会议。
description.en: The Fifth Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 指时任中国共产党中央委员会副主席林彪及其家人在1971年9月13日试图出逃苏联但坠机于蒙古的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event in which Lin Biao, then Vice Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and his family attempted to flee to the Soviet Union on September 13, 1971, but their plane crashed in Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党官方认定的一个在“文化大革命”期间存在的“反革命集团”。
description.en: A 'counter-revolutionary clique' officially identified by the Communist Party of China as existing during the 'Cultural Revolution'.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪80年代中国由邓小平和陈云共同主导的政治格局。
description.en: Refers to the political landscape in China during the 1980s, co-dominated by Deng Xiaoping and Chen Yun.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党主要创始人及早期领导人。
description.en: A main founder and early leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人，曾任中共中央总书记。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1935年1月，遵义会议补选毛泽东为中央政治局常委，确立了其在党内的领导地位。
description.en: In January 1935, the Zunyi Conference elected Mao Zedong as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau, establishing his leadership position within the Party.

description.zh-cn: 在1938年中共六届六中全会期间，担任中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat during the 6th Plenary Session of the 6th CPC Central Committee in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 在1938年中共六届六中全会期间，担任中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat during the 6th Plenary Session of the 6th CPC Central Committee in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 在1938年中共六届六中全会期间，担任中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat during the 6th Plenary Session of the 6th CPC Central Committee in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 在1938年中共六届六中全会期间，担任中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat during the 6th Plenary Session of the 6th CPC Central Committee in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 在1938年中共六届六中全会期间，担任中央书记处书记。
description.en: Served as a secretary of the Central Secretariat during the 6th Plenary Session of the 6th CPC Central Committee in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 1945年中共七大确立了毛泽东的核心地位。
description.en: The 7th National Congress of the CPC in 1945 established Mao Zedong's core status.

description.zh-cn: 1945年中共七届一中全会上当选为中央书记处书记，成为“五大书记”之首。
description.en: Elected as a secretary of the Central Secretariat at the first plenary session of the 7th CPC Central Committee in 1945, becoming the head of the 'Five Great Secretaries'.

description.zh-cn: 1945年中共七届一中全会上当选为中央书记处书记，是“五大书记”之一。
description.en: Elected as a secretary of the Central Secretariat at the first plenary session of the 7th CPC Central Committee in 1945, becoming one of the 'Five Great Secretaries'.

description.zh-cn: 1945年中共七届一中全会上当选为中央书记处书记，是“五大书记”之一。
description.en: Elected as a secretary of the Central Secretariat at the first plenary session of the 7th CPC Central Committee in 1945, becoming one of the 'Five Great Secretaries'.

description.zh-cn: 1945年中共七届一中全会上当选为中央书记处书记，是“五大书记”之一。
description.en: Elected as a secretary of the Central Secretariat at the first plenary session of the 7th CPC Central Committee in 1945, becoming one of the 'Five Great Secretaries'.

description.zh-cn: 1945年中共七届一中全会上当选为中央书记处书记，是“五大书记”之一，于1950年去世。
description.en: Elected as a secretary of the Central Secretariat at the first plenary session of the 7th CPC Central Committee in 1945, becoming one of the 'Five Great Secretaries'; passed away in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 1950年递补任弼时成为“五大书记”之一。
description.en: Replaced Ren Bishi in 1950 to become one of the 'Five Great Secretaries'.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月中共八届一中全会上，当选为中央委员会主席。
description.en: In September 1956, at the first plenary session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, he was elected Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月中共八届一中全会上，当选为中央委员会副主席。
description.en: In September 1956, at the first plenary session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, he was elected Vice Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月中共八届一中全会上，当选为中央委员会副主席。
description.en: In September 1956, at the first plenary session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, he was elected Vice Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月中共八届一中全会上，当选为中央委员会副主席。
description.en: In September 1956, at the first plenary session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, he was elected Vice Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月中共八届一中全会上，当选为中央委员会副主席。
description.en: In September 1956, at the first plenary session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, he was elected Vice Chairman of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月中共八届一中全会上，当选为中央委员会总书记。
description.en: In September 1956, at the first plenary session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, he was elected General Secretary of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月起，兼任国务院副总理。
description.en: Starting from September 1956, he also served as Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 1956年9月起，兼任国防委员会副主席。
description.en: Starting from September 1956, he also served as Vice Chairman of the National Defense Commission.

description.zh-cn: 1958年5月中共八届五中全会上，林彪被增选为中央政治局常委和中共中央副主席。
description.en: In May 1958, at the Fifth Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, Lin Biao was elected as a member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and Vice Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命的开始标志着“毛刘周朱陈林邓”这一领导集体格局的终结。
description.en: The beginning of the Cultural Revolution marked the end of the 'Mao-Liu-Zhou-Zhu-Chen-Lin-Deng' collective leadership structure.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文革开始后，林彪一度成为仅次于毛泽东的接班人。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began in 1966, Lin Biao became the designated successor to Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，林彪被确立为毛泽东的接班人。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Lin Biao was established as Mao Zedong's successor.

description.zh-cn: 1971年林彪事件后，林彪政治生涯终结。
description.en: After the Lin Biao incident in 1971, Lin Biao's political career ended.

description.zh-cn: 林彪事件后，林彪被定为林彪反党集团的主谋。
description.en: After the Lin Biao incident, Lin Biao was identified as the mastermind of the Lin Biao Anti-Party Clique.

description.zh-cn: 在八十年代与陈云共同主导中国政治，形成“双峰政治”格局。
description.en: Co-dominated Chinese politics with Chen Yun in the 1980s, forming a 'dual-peak politics' pattern.

description.zh-cn: 在八十年代与邓小平共同主导中国政治，形成“双峰政治”格局。
description.en: Co-dominated Chinese politics with Deng Xiaoping in the 1980s, forming a 'dual-peak politics' pattern.

description.zh-cn: 1989年5月，陈云提出“以邓小平为头子（核心）的党中央”，巩固了邓小平的领导核心地位。
description.en: In May 1989, Chen Yun proposed 'the Party Central Committee with Deng Xiaoping as its head (core)', consolidating Deng's core leadership position.
